title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Tezuka_Osamu_Cultural_Prize
transformers_text: Named after Osamu Tezuka the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize Tezuka Osamu Bunk ash is a yearly manga prize awarded to manga artists or their works that follow the Osamu Tezuka manga approach founded and sponsored by Asahi S him bun The prize has been awarded since 1997 in Tokyo Japan
